@realDonaldTrump Hahaha, just like a blind arrow, he doesn't know next president may be @JoeBiden, just only because you not follow pandemic play book, Joe Biden also convey you before some years that you will face pandemic. But ur arrogance always negative for nation.
#COVID #COVID19 #sabcnews
